column3: Wawlika has a message to share with you.
Ah, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, glad you're here! Zawpya told me he needs to speak with you.
As for why he didn't simply track you down himself, your guess is as good as mine...
At any rate, you'll find him over at Shaaloani Station. Safe travels!
Sorry, friend, but Zawpya didn't tell me why he asked for you. He should be at the station.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! Perfect timing. You see, I have a problem...
It's the Dawnblazer. I know she detonated in the line of duty, but try as I might, I can't get that armored angel out of my mind!
After she came up in conversation the other day, it relit a fire in me. One thing led to another, and I found myself stitching together a little something inspired by her design.
I know how crazy this must sound, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, but I'd really love for you to have this ensemble!
(And if it's not to your liking, maybe you could find a roundabout way of asking Nitowikwe what she thinks of it...?)
Just think about it, all right? Together, we can keep her memory alive. Through us, the Dawnblazer will ride on!
